plot: A gangster movie where all the gangsters are played by children. Instead of real bullets they use &"splurge guns&" that cover the victim in cream. The story tells of the rise of &"Bugsy Malone&" and the battle for power between &"Fat Sam&" and &"Dandy Dan&".   Written by  Steve Crook
title: Bugsy Malone, nieto de Al Capone
plot_es: A gangster movie where all the gangsters are played by children. Instead of real bullets they use &"splurge guns&" that cover the victim in cream. The story tells of the rise of &"Bugsy Malone&" and the battle for power between &"Fat Sam&" and &"Dandy Dan&".   Written by  Steve Crook

lists.title: 500 pelis que ver y alguna de propina
